meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>stand up</kanji> to do your <kanji>duty</kanji> you're standing up and finally being useful. That's why this verb means <vocabulary>to be useful</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 役 is the one you learned with the kanji. The 立つ reading is that of the 立つ vocabulary, which you should be familiar with by now.
